headline: Is Adding Former PwC Chair to Audit Committees Reframing Moody’s (MCO) Governance and Risk Story?
summary: In January 2026, Moody’s Corporation said it had elected veteran auditor Lisa P. Sawicki, formerly Global Board Chair at PricewaterhouseCoopers, to its Board of Directors effective March 16, 2026, with roles on the Audit and Governance & Nominating Committees. Her extensive experience overseeing audit quality, governance and financial services clients adds further depth to Moody’s board as the firm faces an increasingly complex global risk and regulatory landscape.
